QuestData.Title: Through Glass
QuestData.Description:
The mirror frame rests at the bottom of Redelav Hall. Kleia and Pelagos wait there.
With these shards, I can piece it together.
We will go through, grab the sinstone, and go face the Countess. Let nothing stand in our way.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: In charge of guarding the Countess's sinstone from those who would use it to blackmail her.
QuestData.LogDescription: Go through the mirror, then collect the Countess's Sinstone.
